China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2023 年 12 月 20 日星期三 16:09:08 GMT 120
US missile defense proposal stirs debate in PalauA proposal for permanent deployment of U.S. Patriot missile defense batteries in Palau in response to China's expanding reach in the Pacific has come under fire as the nation's politicians debate the move ahead of elections next year. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 15:50:24 GMT PV4ZIZPQDFLD7O34673WK6CSUM https://www.reuters.com/world/us-missile-defense-proposal-stirs-debate-palau-2023-12-20/David Brunnstrom, Kirsty Needham世界
Shipping container price surge to reverse due to overcapacity -logistics platformHigher prices for containers used by merchant ships caused by attacks on Red Sea shipping are likely to fall back in three to nine months to levels seen in early December due to market overcapacity, the head of an online container logistics platform said on Wednesday. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 15:39:36 GMT AZ4Z4T5EYNIEFKJUAPD6HLPMTU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/shipping-container-price-surge-reverse-due-overcapacity-logistics-platform-2023-12-20/Divya Chowdhury世界中东
In China's eyes we're all separatists, Taiwan presidential frontrunner saysIn China's eyes all three Taiwan presidential candidates are separatists, the frontrunner to be the island's next leader said on Wednesday in a fractious joint televised address with the other contenders. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 14:30:13 GMT OW7RSAOC4VP53FCWAAUOMWS2DTE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/chinas-eyes-were-all-separatists-taiwan-presidential-frontrunner-says-2023-12-20/Ben Blanchard, Angie Teo世界亚太地区
Canada's Trudeau sees shift in India relations after US plot revealed -CBCCanadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau said he senses a change in India's tone with Ottawa after the United States warned New Delhi about its involvement in a thwarted plot to kill a Sikh separatist leader on U.S. soil, the CBC reported on Wednesday. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 13:28:20 GMT W32IY45NQJK5FLYEJHWWEB7C2A https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/canadas-trudeau-sees-shift-india-relations-after-us-plot-revealed-cbc-2023-12-20/Reuters世界美洲
US-China relations: Expect more turbulence in 2024After a year that brought panic over spy balloons, a fight over semiconductors and an intensifying military rivalry, China and the U.S. are ending the year with an uneasy detente. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 11:06:37 GMT BOIUY7S4MBLI7IE4UF6TFFGXQE https://www.reuters.com/world/expect-more-turbulence-us-china-2024-2023-12-20/Don Durfee, Antoni Slodkowski世界
Asia feels the sting of India's onion export banIndia's ban on the export of onions has driven up prices of the vegetable for Asian buyers, who are scrambling for cheaper alternatives, particularly as New Delhi is unlikely to lift the curbs before general elections next year. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 09:10:00 GMT BSSLKN3YG5KN7OITXYW5AUYJFY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/asia-feels-sting-indias-onion-export-ban-2023-12-20/Rajendra Jadhav, Ruma Paul, Gopal Sharma世界亚太地区
